entities.name: the ghoul in pajamas
entities.description: The Ghoul in Pajamas is mentioned as being under Ron's mum's nose, implying that it is a mysterious and possibly supernatural entity.

entities.name: ron's mum
entities.description: Ron's mum is mentioned as having her memory modified by Harry, making her believe she has a different name and life ambition.

entities.name: wendell wilkins
entities.description: Wendell Wilkins is the name given to Ron's dad after his memory was modified by Harry.

entities.name: monica wilkins
entities.description: Monica Wilkins is the name given to Ron's mum after her memory was modified by Harry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as trying to track down and interrogate Harry's parents about him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who has modified his parents' memories and is on a hunt for Horcruxes.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Ron's girlfriend who is shown to be emotional about Harry's situation.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Hermione's boyfriend and Harry's friend, who is shown to be concerned about Harry's lack of tact.

relationships.description: Voldemort is trying to track down and interrogate Harry about him, as mentioned in the text.
Harry has modified Ron's mum's memory so that she believes she is Wendell Wilkins and has a different life ambition, as mentioned in the text.
Harry has modified Ron's dad's memory so that he believes he is Wendell Wilkins, as mentioned in the text.
Harry has modified Ron's mum's memory so that she believes she is Monica Wilkins, as mentioned in the text.
